thread.section_title: London Marriott Hotel County Hall - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing afternoon tea
thread.title_full: Amazing afternoon tea - Review of London Marriott Hotel County Hall, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: luke14ott
title: Amazing afternoon tea
text:
Visited here on 13th march turned up and made to feel very welcome we booked afternoon tea for 2pm we had about 30mins before so had time for a lovely cocktail.
Then the amazing and wonderful afternoon tea. We chose the unlimited bubbles option and we spent near on 2 hrs enjoying the food the views and the bubbles, the staff were fantastic so please pass on my praise to the staff involved.
The price is great value for a stunning hotel similar locally at a lesser place with no views and no unlimited bubbles charge similar so we wil visit again for sure. Maybe when my numbers come in for lotto we could stay a night here.
